title: Bloomberg Markets: Catalan President Walks Back Independence
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Catalan President Walks Back Independence
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Maria Tadeo\u0010Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Discussing Catalonia’s President Carles Puigdemont stepping back from declaring immediate independence from Spain, instead seeking talks with the government in Madrid over the future of his region. Katy Collin, Post-Doctoral Fellow at the Brookings Institution Foreign Policy Program, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
